subject: Order SSN6008
description_text:
Simsonn Team,

I am writing to check on the status of my order, SSN6008.

I paid for express shipping, but it has been one week and I have not seen
any updates regarding the delivery. Given the delay, I am concerned that I
am not receiving the express service I paid for.

Could you please provide an update on the current status of my shipment and
look into why there has been no progress?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Stephen Tassinaro

conversations.body_text: Hi Stephen Tassinaro,  â€‹Because this product needed an upgrade, it has been out of stock for two weeks. Currently, we have completed the upgrade and arranged for shipment on the 17th. By then, you will receive the latest product with an improved experience. We sincerely apologize for the delay and any inconvenience this may have caused you.
Hi Stephen Tassinaro,  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238967573
